notifications.description: Stay up to date with the latest updates, news and important information.
notifications.notes: We are committed to sending you only useful and important notifications. And, you have the option to change your notification preferences at any time.
notifications.title: Notifications

personalized_ads.description: By allowing your ads to be personalized, you will benefit from an advertising experience that is more tailored to your interests.
personalized_ads.notes: We value your privacy and are committed to using your information only for the purpose of improving your experience and presenting you with relevant ads.
personalized_ads.title: Personalized ads
